mapper.sql: a.id as id ,a.username as username ,a.password as password ,a.weixiurenyuan_name as weixiurenyuanName ,a.weixiurenyuan_phone as weixiurenyuanPhone ,a.weixiurenyuan_id_number as weixiurenyuanIdNumber ,a.weixiurenyuan_photo as weixiurenyuanPhoto ,a.sex_types as sexTypes ,a.weixiurenyuan_email as weixiurenyuanEmail ,a.create_time as createTime
mapper.select:
SELECT
-- 级联表的字段
FROM weixiurenyuan a
and a.id in
#{item}
and a.username like CONCAT('%',#{params.username},'%')
and a.password like CONCAT('%',#{params.password},'%')
and a.weixiurenyuan_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.weixiurenyuanName},'%')
and a.weixiurenyuan_phone like CONCAT('%',#{params.weixiurenyuanPhone},'%')
and a.weixiurenyuan_id_number like CONCAT('%',#{params.weixiurenyuanIdNumber},'%')
and a.sex_types = #{params.sexTypes}
and a.weixiurenyuan_email like CONCAT('%',#{params.weixiurenyuanEmail},'%')
order by a.${params.orderBy} desc
